message: Analyzing customer engagement and CRM strategies for Apple - iPhone 15 targeting Retail Consumers based on social media interactions, Google Reviews, Twitter Mentions, and last 12 months sales data.

content.topic: Analyzing Customer Engagement and CRM Strategies for Apple - iPhone 15 among Retail Consumers

questions.question: How satisfied are you with your overall experience using the Apple iPhone 15?
What features of the iPhone 15 do you find most appealing or valuable?
Have you engaged with Apple's iPhone 15 content on social media? If yes, please share your thoughts.
questions.question_type: Multiple Choice (Yes/No) with Open Text Field

questions.question: Based on your experience and interactions, how likely are you to recommend the iPhone 15 to friends or family?
How would you rate your interactions with Apple's customer service regarding the iPhone 15?

content.deployment_plan: The survey will be distributed via email to a segmented list of Apple iPhone 15 customers. It will also be shared on Apple's social media platforms with a personalized message encouraging participation. Responses will be collected over a two-week period, with reminders sent out to non-respondents.
